item.title: Hello World
item.description: Thanks for visiting my site. More content coming soon.

item.title: About Me
item.description: This blog covers personal projects, work-related learnings and other random interests I’ve felt compelled to write about. I live in Berlin and work as a Data Science consultant, with experience ranging across industries and problem spaces. You can find further details on my LinkedIn profile. I’m also involved in these projects: A GIVEN B which is a collaborative initiative to bridge the gap between data science and designers to improve how we work together.
